The eKincare wellness score is a single score representative of your overall health. Wellness score helps you get actionable insights on the areas you need to focus on, to improve your health.

Blood SOS maps and sends out an SMS seeking donation from matching blood groups within 10KM distance when you are in need.

string-array.name: water_benefits
string-array.item: Staying hydrated can reduce risk of colon cancer by 45% and bladder cancer by 50%.
If you don\'t drink water,you will die.It\'s that important. We can live only a few days without water ;maybe a week.
Dehydration can affect your mood and make you grumpy and confused.Think clearer and be happier by drinking more water.
Drinking water contributes to increased athletic performance. Water composes 75% of our muscle tissue!
Digestive system needs water to flush out waste in the form of urine and sweat
Sometimes headaches can be caused by dehydration. Next time your head hurts,try drinking water first.
Regular water consumption can improve the color and texture of your skin by keeping it building new cells properly.
Drinking water helps the skin, the largest organ in the body, to do it\'s job of regulating the body\'s temperature through sweating.
Water is essential for the proper circulation of nutrients in the body. Drink water,Stay Hydrated.
Drinking water can reduce pain in your joints by keeping the cartilage soft and hydrated.
Drinking Adequate water keeps things flowing along your gastrointestinal tract and prevents constipation. Water Helps Maintain Normal Bowel Function.
If you\'re feeling drained and depleted, get a pick-me-up with water. Dehydration makes you feel tired.
Drinking water helps prevent muscle cramping and lubricates joints in the body.When you\'re well hydrated, you can exercise longer and stronger.
People aren\'t drinking enough water leading in the rise of kidney stones.Kidney stones can\'t form in diluted urine, so reduce your risk with plenty of water!
Waters ability to release heat from the body when sweat evaporates from the surface of the skin greatly helps maintain an even body temperature.
Drinking water is an effective way to get rid of hangover. Alcohol dehydrates the body.Water helps rehydrate the body and speed up recovery.
Bad breath is a clear sign that you aren\’t drinking enough water.It keeps your mouth moist,washes and dilutes the smelly compounds that oral bacteria create.
Drinking warm water every morning is very beneficial for women as it can prevent premature aging.
Drinking hot water is an excellent natural remedy for colds,coughs and sore throat.It relieves sore throat and also helps in clearing nasal congestion.
Drinking water cleanses your body and eliminates the root causes of acne-related infections.
Drinking hot water is also good for obtaining soft, shiny hair. It energizes the nerve endings in your hair roots and makes them active.
Drinking water along with lemon helps fight viral infection.
Good hydration can prevent arthritis. With plenty of water in your body, there is less friction in your joints, thus less chance of developing arthritis.
Drinking water develops and supports healthy brain cells.
Drinking water improves concentration and maintains memory function.
Water contains minerals like calcium and magnesium which is necessary for the body.
By the time you feel thirsty, your body has lost more than 1 percent of its total water – so let\’s not feel thirst. Take a break right now and have a glass of water.
Water is in lymph, a fluid that is part of your immune system, which helps you fight off illness.
Drink Water as 2% drop in body water can cause fuzzy short-term memory,trouble with basic math and difficulty focusing on the computer screen or a printed page.
One glass of water shuts down midnight hunger pangs for almost 100% of the dieters investigated in a University of Washington study.
Drink water because even MILD dehydration will slow down one\'s metabolism as much as 3%.
Lack of water is the no. 1 trigger of daytime fatigue. Stay fit, Drink Water.
Good water intake prevents the skin from sagging. Drink water for a healthy skin.
Drink water because A 2% reduction of water levels in the body can lead to a 20% decrease in mental and physical performance.
Drink water.Not drinking water will lead to muscle spasms
study shows that drinking a half litre of water half an hour before meals helps people eat fewer calories and lose 44% more weight.
Drink water as lack of water causes mood swings
Not drinking enough water increases the probability of you having health problems.
Drinking water carries heat away from the internal organs hence protecting you from heat stroke.
Water is one of the best cure for hangovers as it nullifies dehydration caused by alcohol.
Drinking ice-cold water before and during exercise can improve endurance by 23 % as it forces the body to expend calories warming it up.

Do you want to delete this image?

To get the best experience keep these points in mind.
 1.Place the camera parallel to document on a horizontal surface.
 2.Adjust the camera for the best perspective of document.
 3.Make sure the background have contrast color(White document on black background surface).
 4.Click the capture button at the bottom of the screen.

To enhance the capture process you can use one of the following.
 1.Place the camera parallel to document on a horizontal surface.
 2.Adjust the camera for the best perspective of document.
 3.Make sure the background have contrast color(White document on black background surface).
 4.Picture will be taken when user clicks the capture icon..

Do you want to share your profile with the doctor? Doctor will be able to see your medical history and vitals like height, weight, blood glucose values etc. He/she will be able to enter comments directly against your profile. Don\'t worry the access will be revoked after 48 hours.
